definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: The Education Department willrewardaward the first grants early next year.
sentences.chinese: 教育部明年早期会给一等奖发奖。

sentences.english: Finally, Zhu Pingkang won the first prize in the styling contest of motorboats with a score of 4297.
sentences.chinese: 最终，朱平康以4297分夺得摩托艇花样赛一等奖。

sentences.english: The first prize was awarded to the youngest competitor.
sentences.chinese: 一等奖授给了最年轻的比赛者。

sentences.english: Two of my books respectively won the first-class reward and the second-class reward of national excellent books.
sentences.chinese: 我的两本书分别荣获全国优秀图书一等奖和二等奖。

sentences.english: Maria won the first prize in the singing-match yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天的歌咏比赛中，马里亚得了一等奖。

sentences.english: Pauls classmates congratulated him on his winning the first prize.
sentences.chinese: 保罗的同学们祝贺他获得了一等奖。

sentences.english: I won the first prize in the Computer-Aided Design Contest once.
sentences.chinese: 我获得过一次“电脑辅助设计大赛”一等奖。

sentences.english: At the nationing feelateur song-writing contest: he won economic crisis-clrear end award.
sentences.chinese: 在全国业余作曲比赛中，他获得了一等奖。

sentences.english: I won the first prize in singing competition yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天的歌咏比赛中，马里亚得了一等奖。

sentences.english: Zhou Ling, the youngest one in our class.
sentences.chinese: 我们班上最年轻的同学周玲获一等奖。

sentences.english: Finally, Zhu Pingkang, with a score of 4297, won the first prize in the synchronized motorboat racing.
sentences.chinese: 最终，朱平康以4297分夺得摩托艇花样赛一等奖。

sentences.english: He won first prize in the woodwind section.
sentences.chinese: 他获得木管乐器组一等奖。

sentences.english: In 2005, Sichuan Province, Tai Chi sword competition won first prize.
sentences.chinese: 2005年四川省太极拳比赛获太极刀一等奖。

sentences.english: I bet I'll get the first prize.
November 2009, Hubei TV challenge joke king won the first prize.
sentences.chinese: 2009年11月，湖北卫视挑战笑话王获一等奖。

sentences.english: Eg:----Jim will win the first prize.

definition: to display for evaluation/to exhibit and compare
